body: <dnn:Breadcrumb runat="server" id="${1:dnnBreadcrumb}" CssClass="$2" RootLevel="${3:1}" Separator="$4" UseTitle="${5:[true, false]}" />
DNN Breadcrumbs.description: Displays the path to the current tab (> is the default separator). Example: PageName1 > PageName2 > PageName3

body: <dnn:DnnCssInclude runat="server" PathNameAlias="${1:[SkinPath, SharedScripts]}" FilePath="$2" Priority="$3" ForceProvider="$4" />
DNN CSS Include.description: Adds a stylesheet reference to the page.

DNN CSS Exclude.description: Prevents a stylesheet reference from being included in the page.

DNN Copyright.description: Displays the copyright notice for the website.

body: <dnn:CurrentDate runat="server" id="${1:dnnCurrentDate}" CssClass="$2" DateFormat="${3:MMM dd, yyyy}" />
DNN Date.description: Displays the current date on the server.

body:
<dnn:Menu runat="server" MenuStyle="$1" NodeSelector="$2" IncludeNodes="$3" ExcludeNodes="$4" IncludeHidden="$5" NodeXmlPath="$6" NodeManipulator="$7">
	<TemplateArguments> 
		<dnn:TemplateArgument Name="" Value="" />
	</TemplateArguments>
	<ClientOptions>
		<dnn:ClientString Name="" Value="" />
		<dnn:ClientNumber Name="" Value="" />
		<dnn:ClientBoolean Name="" Value="" />
	</ClientOptions>
DNN DDR Menu.description: Displays a menu using the DDRMenu control.

body: <dnn:DnnJsInclude runat="server" PathNameAlias="${1:[SkinPath, SharedScripts]}" FilePath="$2" Priority="$3" ForceProvider="$4" />
DNN Javascript Include.description: Adds a JavaScript file reference to the page.

DNN JS Exclude.description: Prevents a javascript reference from being included in the page.

body: <dnn:Language runat="server" id="${1:dnnLanguage}" ShowMenu="${2:[true, false]}" ShowLinks="${3:[true, false]}" CommonHeaderTemplate="$4" HeaderTemplate="$5" ItemTemplate="$6" AlternateTemplate="$7" SeparatorTemplate="$8" FooterTemplate="$9" CommonFooterTemplate="$10" CssClass="$11" />
DNN Language.description: Displays the language selector dropdown list or the language flags based on the theme object attribute settings.

body: <dnn:LINKS runat="server" id="${1:dnnLINKS}" CssClass="$2" Separator="$3" Alignment="${4:[horizontal, vertical]}" Level="${5:[same, child, parent, root]}" ForceLinks="${6:[true, false]}" />
DNN Links.description: Displays a flat menu of links associated with the current tab level and the parent node.

body: <dnn:Login runat="server" id="${1:dnnLogin}" Text="${2:Login}" CssClass="$3" LogoffText="${4:Logout}" LegacyMode="${5:true}" />
DNN Login.description: Displays Login for anonymous users and Logout for authenticated users.

DNN Privacy.description: Displays a link to the Privacy Information page for the website.

body: <dnn:Search runat="server" id="${1:dnnSearch}" CssClass="$2" ShowSite="${3:false}" ShowWeb="${4:false}" SiteIconURL="$5" SiteText="$6" SiteToolTip="$7" SiteUrl="$8" Submit="$9" UseWebForSite="${10:false}" UseDropDownList="${11:false}" WebIconURL="$12" WebText="$13" WebToolTip="$14" WebURL="$15" />
<dnn:Terms runat="server" id="${1:dnnTerms}" Text="${2:Terms of Use}" CssClass="$3" />
<dnn:TEXT runat="server" id="${1:dnnTEXT}" Text="$2" resourceKey="$3" replaceTokens="${4:false}" CssClass="$5" />
DNN Text.description: Displays localized text in your theme and supports the use of token replacement.

DNN User.description: Displays a Register link for anonymous users or the user's name for authenticated users.
